src_original: darśayati / yāvat pratyakṣaṃ svaviṣaye svātmani niścayaṃ nitpādayati,  na tāvat pramāṇaṃ bhavati ātmavyāpārānirvartanāt /  tataścādhyavasāyaṃ kurvadeva pramāṇamiti niścayamaprkṣate /  nanu yadi niścayaṃ vinā pramāṇameva na bhavati pratyakṣaṃ vikalpasahitam,  tarhi pratyakṣaṃ pramāṇaṃ syāt,
tgt_original: pramāṇatvopacārastu nirvyāpāre na vidyate |  viṣayākāra evāsya pramāṇaṃ tena mīyate |  svasaṃvittiḥ phalaṃ vā'tra tadrūpādarthaniścayāt ||  yadābhāsaṃ prameyaṃ tat pramāṇamatha tatphalam |

src_original: 2 svārtha parārtha ca //  anumānakathanānujñārthamāha- anumānaṃ dvidheti /  anumānasya prakārau dvau veditavyau /  jñānābhidhānātmakayoḥ svaparārthānumānayoḥ sāmānyalakṣaṇaṃ kimapi nāsti,  kathaṃ tāvat pūrvaṃ na lakṣaṇamabhidīyeta?  vibhāgena ca pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇaṃ sukhena vaktu śakyam /

tgt_original: lakṣaṇa eva hi prathamato jijñāsā samudeti |

src_original: anumānaṃ dvidhā dviprakāram /  athānumānalakṣaṇe vaktavye kimakasmāt prakārabheda kathyate?
tgt_original: sati samanugate lakṣaṇe prathamaṃ tadeva nirūpaṇiyam |  asati tu viśeṣayoreva |

src_original: ucyate parārthānumānaṃ śabdātmakam,  svārthānumānaṃ tu jñānātmakam,

tayoratyantabhedāt naikaṃ lakṣaṇamasti /  tatastayoḥ pratiniyataṃ lakṣaṇamākhyātu prakārabhedaḥ kathyate /  aśakyatāṃ ca prakārabhedakathanamantareṇa lakṣaṇanirdeśasya jñātvā prāk prakārabhedaḥ kathyate iti // 1 //
tgt_original: tadenayorvisajātīyayornaikaṃ lakṣaṇaṃ ghaṭate |  tat prathamaṃ vibhajyaiva tayorlakṣaṇaṃ vaktavyamiti yukto vibhāgaḥ |  svārthamityetad vyutpādayati--svasmai yat tat svārthamiti |
